channel.title: [hyperion] error starting [help]
channel.description:
hello, i decided to go to hyperion today and i installed ANT and when i come to run the server i get this from the run.bat [code]07-Apr-2010 02:47:40 org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:40 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:41 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 07-Apr-2010 02:47:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. 07-Apr-2010 02:47:46 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:48 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. 07-Apr-2010 02:47:48 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 07-Apr-2010 02:47:55 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions 07-Apr-2010 02:47:58 org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDe finitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:139) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
any help would be great :D but i really need now or im off to bed lol 3 am o.O

Are the text for teleports (E.g. Varrock teleport, teleports you to Varrock) in the cache or somewhere else? IF so where are they?

item.title: [hyperion] error starting [help]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

lotto320:

Change the d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml text in bin\org\hyperion\rs2\model in the file called ‘‘NpcDefinitions.java’’ to c:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml than compile with any program. Hope i helped someone.

do you know this topic is 11months old?

Read full topic

item.title: [hyperion] error starting [help]
item.dc:creator: @CoderNexus CoderNexus
item.description:
@CoderNexus wrote:

'Grats for you on using Hyperion.

Are you running it using eclipse? If yes, did you change the .jar files to your own types in the library folder? Here’s a tutorial on how to run it correctly with no errors: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoYKZ2xoXLM

If you still get errors, just reply.

Read full topic

item.title: [hyperion] error starting [help]

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml

Maybe because you don’t have a d drive with npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml on it…
